{{- $json := "" }} {{- $skin := "model/base/scripts.json" }} {{- $core := "_core/model/base/scripts.json" }} {{- $path := printf "static/script/css/tailwind.css" -}} {{- if resources.Get $skin -}} {{- $json = $skin -}} {{- else -}} {{- $json = $core -}} {{- end -}} {{- with resources.Get $json -}} {{- $conf := . | transform.Unmarshal -}} {{- with resources.Get "vend/animax/main.js" }} {{- if and ( eq hugo.IsDevelopment true ) ( eq $conf.ven.animax true ) }} {{- with . | js.Build }} {{- end }} {{- else if and ( eq hugo.IsProduction true ) ( eq $conf.ven.animax true ) }} {{- $opts := dict "minify" true }} {{- with . | js.Build $opts | fingerprint }} {{- end }} {{- end }} {{- end }} {{- end -}}
